attributes.action: Make basic first aid training compulsory in the national curriculum.
attributes.additional_details: Most people who witness a given cardiac arrest on the street will be bystanders, I want that number to decrease and the number of helpers to increase.
attributes.background: I went on a youth first aid course and realised the importance for young people to have any form of first aid training. I guarantee that even basic first aid training in schools will be beneficial for society and will save more lives.
